required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Tegafur Combined With Temozolomide Versus Tegafur Combined With Temozolomide and Thalidomide in Subjects With Advanced Extrapancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumor
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Randomized,Controlled,Open Label,Multicentre Study of Tegafur Combined With Temozolomide Versus Tegafur Combined With Temozolomide and Thalidomide in Subjects With Advanced Extrapancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumor

brief_summary.textblock: A Phase II Randomized,Controlled,Open Label,Multicentre Study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Tegafur combined with Temozolomide versus Tegafur combined with Temozolomide and Thalidomide in subjects with Advanced Extrapancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumor

primary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization，each 6 weeks or 12 weeks(a year later) up to intolerance to the toxicity or PD (up to 24 months)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization，each 6 weeks or 12 weeks(a year later) up to intolerable toxicity or PD (up to 24 months)
From randomization，each 6 weeks or 12 weeks(a year later)up to PD or death(up to 24 months)
From randomization，each 6 weeks or 12 weeks(a year later) up to PD or death(up to 24 months)
From randomization，each 6 weeks or 12 weeks(a year later)(a year later) up to PD or death (up to 24 months)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Tegafur and Temozolomide combined with Thalidomide

intervention.arm_group_label: Tegafur and Temozolomide combined with Thalidomide
Tegafur and Temozolomide combined with Thalidomide

intervention.description: Thalidomide 100mg po qd(d1-d7) Thalidomide 200mg po qd(d8-d14) Thalidomide 300mg po qd(d15-d21)
intervention.arm_group_label: Tegafur and Temozolomide combined with Thalidomide
